name: small isometric lvl
description:
A small isometric lvl I made to test some 2D assets I created recently.

This is a toy with no functionality.

Controls: arrow keys/ WASD

The character + animation is from the asset store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/tiny-rpg-forest-114685

BGM: https://opengameart.org/content/happy-adventure-loop
